text: aur isamen se jis par apanee (chikanee chupadee) baat se qaaboo pa sake vaho aur apane (chelon ke lashkar) savaar aur paidal (sab) se chadhaee kar aur maal aur aulaad mein unake saath saajha kare aur unase (khoob jhoothe) vaayade kar aur shaitaan to unase jo vaayade karata hai dhokhe ke siva kuchh nahin hota
